name: Lava World
desc: Molten seas, ash skies, industrial hellscapes, temple-forges.

name: Barren Rock
desc: Cratered stone, thin air, mining claims and radio telescopes.

name: Dry World
desc: Cold deserts, dust seas, canyon cities, hidden aquifers.

name: Garden World
desc: Oceans and continents; the obvious jewel that everyone wants.

name: Ocean World
desc: Endless seas; floating nations; deep horrors; pressure vaults.

name: Swamp World
desc: Thick air, fungal forests, disease gods, amphibious empires.

name: Ice World
desc: Glacier crust, subsurface oceans, cryo-ruins, comet harvesters.

name: Gas Giant
desc: Storm bands and gravity; moons matter more than the planet.

name: Super-Earth
desc: High gravity; towering mountains; dense atmospheres; pressure states.

name: Tidally Locked World
desc: Permanent day/night; twilight ring civilizations; migratory ecologies.

name: Ringworld (Artificial)
desc: A band around the star; politics measured in orbital degrees.

name: Dyson Swarm (Artificial)
desc: A million habitats; a million rival doctrines.
